title: KOREAN TWITCH BUILD | BLACK CLEAVER YOUMUUS - LEAGUE OF LEGENDS

embed.description: After thinking why the new korean lucian build was such a success i worked out it was because he had his passive and his ult. both being bullets which work with the black cleaver really well. since the black cleaver reduces armour after ever attack up to 6 times it made sense why the lucian build worked.

body: let me know what you think of the build
